sub_title: Chemistry & Life Sciences Consultant for A&G at Elsevier • PhD in Chemistry • Trusted Advisor
summary:
I work as Chemistry & Life Sciences Consultant at Elsevier serving the A&G community. I hold a Ph.D. in organic and supramolecular chemistry from the Institute of Chemical Research of Catalonia (ICIQ) in Tarragona, Spain. I am always keen to share my experience in the academia-to-industry transition as an industry advisor. I enjoy organizing scientific outreach events and sometimes act as facilitator and co-leader at workshops for graduate students. I believe that fostering and promoting the work of the younger generations of chemists and scientists is key to a better and fairer society. I speak Italian as my native language and am fluent in English and Spanish. 

Twitter: @MoncelsiG

[{'company': {'id': 3027, 'name': 'Elsevier', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQFvlGwwa4KXFA/company-logo_400_400/0/1688142511630?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=wKSwKv6rIJKKj6tGlzeI42wL-UV3k2iPSKLp9KgoZB8', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/elsevier/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam, Olanda Settentrionale, Paesi Bassi', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Elsevier', 'description': "Providing consulting services to A&G institutions across northern Europe, specifically: BeNeLux, UK, Ireland and the Nordics. As a Trusted Advisor on the Elsevier Life Sciences portfolio, I work with the following databases and e-resources: Reaxys, Reaxys Medicinal Chemistry, Reaxys Predictive Retrosynthesis, Embase, EmBiology and PharmaPendium. I am mainly responsible for post-sales technical support, product training and renewal of existing product subscriptions in the assigned territory, meeting the following key responsibilities:
• Dedicated support: providing customers with high quality and flexible support to the different needs of the audience in terms of content, delivery, expected outcome. The type of events span from in person/virtual trainings to workshops, Q&A sessions, and specific queries on our products.
• Technical expertise: ability to build simple and complex search queries on relevant topics and examples in Chemistry, Biomedicine, Pharmacology and Medical Devices.
• Commercial performance: using consultative, value-based and Challenger selling methodologies to meet new and renewal sales targets for Life Sciences solutions, with a focus on upsell-cross-sell opportunities.
• Partnership development: applying a customer-centric approach to build long term professional relationships with new or existing customers. Contributing as speaker, sponsor or exhibitor in international symposia and conferences
• Market development: providing continuous feedback to product and marketing teams to drive Elsevier's global objectives
• Strategy implementation: develop deep understanding of competitor landscape and successfully position the Life Sciences portfolio", 'title': 'Chemistry & Life Sciences Consultant', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 365581, 'name': 'ICIQ', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D0BAQHgUvWgcs0rJg/company-logo_400_400/0/1687868785587?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=wVKPWYvOv8Eudf5w7PViGCqNh--fXD81cd3FPumY7oo', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/iciq/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Tarragona, Spagna', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'ICIQ', 'description': "▪ Design and synthesis of functional molecular containers and guests incorporating photoresponsive units.
